Title: The Hunt for Gollum
Writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Chris Bouchard (screenplay), Sabina Sattar (additional writing), Julianne Honey-Mennal (additional writing), Stuart Price (additional writing), Lewis Albrow (additional writing)
Actors: Adrian Webster, Arin Alldridge, Patrick O'Connor, Rita Ramnani
Plot: The great events of the war of the ring are about to unfold and the priority for Strider and Gandalf is to keep the Ring secret. Sauron is preparing to unleash his armies and Gollum is creeping around Middle Earth with crucial knowledge of the Ring's location. He must be found.
